Service Classes¶

These are the functions that my project provides

class services.DistanceService.DistanceService¶

A service class to assist with retrieving distance values

get_distance_between(address_a, address_b)¶

Get Distance Between Addresses

Given address a & b returns the distance in miles as a float.

Parameters:

  • address_a (str) –

  • address_b (str) –

Returns:

The distance between address a & b

Return type:

float

get_place_by_address(address)¶

Get Place object for given address

Parameters:

address (str) –

Returns:

The matching place for the given address

Return type:

models.Place

get_total_route_weight(route, toggle_half_mode='')¶
Gets the total distance/weight/cost of a given route accounting for starting and finishing at the HUB

by default. If toggle_half_mode is provided calculation only accounts for start or finishing at HUB not both.

Parameters:

  • route (list) – Ordered list of packages

  • toggle_half_mode (str) – Optional param valid options a or b

Returns:

The total distance through route accounting for starting and finishing at HUB

Return type:

int

greedy_shortest_path(truck)¶

Optimizes Truck’s package_list into a feasible route

Parameters:

truck (models.Truck) – Truck that needs package_list to be optimized

ingest_distances()¶

A function that runs during class init to read in Distance data from distances.csv in root.

class services.PackageService.PackageService¶

A service class to assist ingesting package data

get_package_by_id(package_id)¶

Efficiently get package object by given package ID using table lookup

Parameters:

package_id (int) – ID of the package to get

Returns:

Package with the given package_id

Return type:

models.Package

ingest_packages()¶

A function that runs during class init to read in Package data from packages.csv in root.

refresh_package_table(packages)¶

Given a list of packages this will refresh the service’s package table and list

Parameters:

packages (list) – A list of packages

class services.PlaceService.PlaceService¶

A service class to assist with retrieving places

ingest_places()¶

A function that runs during class init to read in Place data from distances.csv in root.
